welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chongqing, where the vibrant city meets the stunning natural beauty of the Yangtze River. Get ready to experience the spicy Sichuan cuisine, explore the ancient cultural sites, and immerse yourself in the charm of this bustling metropolis. Enjoy your stay and all that Chongqing has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.
